attributes.action: Stop all parking charges for NHS staff and volunteers fighting Covid-19.
attributes.additional_details: When our country is desperately relying on the NHS to save live on the frontline during the outbreak of Covid-19, it is imperative that the government support them and immediately stop all parking charges. These heroic people have enough stress and worry without having to pay to save lives.
attributes.background: Immediately cease all car parking charges levied against NHS workers and volunteers.

rejection.details:
The Government have announced that they will provide free car parking for all NHS and social care staff. You can read more about this here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/government-to-provide-free-car-parking-for-nhs-and-social-care-staff

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
